translations: 盛开的；妙龄的；该死的；十足的
开花；繁荣；发光；给（透镜）敷膜；把（金属）压成块（bloom 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Flowers are blooming in a riot of colour.
Flowers of all sorts are blooming in a riot of colour.
The red flowers, blooming like burning fire, light up her world.
sentences.translation: 那些红色的花朵像燃烧的火一样绽放，照亮了她的世界。
